summary: A prequel to Temblores (1990), this movie tells us about how the town of Perfection, Nevada became founded and how they defended it against the Graboids with the help of Burt Gummer's ancestor, Hiram.
cast: Michael Gross|Sara Botsford|Billy Drago|Brent Roam|August Schellenberg|J.E. Freeman|Ming Lo|Lydia Look|Sam Ly|Neal Kopit|Sean Moran|Matthew Seth Wilson|John Dixon|Dan Lemieux|Don Ruffin|Lou Carlucci|Kai Taschner|Andrew Van Hise
keywords: prequel|steam tractor|liberty head double eagle|bicycle riding|animal attack
title: Temblores 4: Comienza la leyenda
